tasks.title: T01 - System context review
tasks.description: Review the full BookYard system context including frontend, backend, data, and AI components. Focus on technical scope, integration points, scalability expectations, and constraints.

tasks.title: T02 - Define service boundaries
tasks.description: Define clear logical boundaries between React frontend, FastAPI backend, recommendation service, RAG chatbot service, and semantic search service.

tasks.title: T03 - API contract strategy
tasks.description: Decide API standards including REST conventions, versioning, error formats, pagination, and authentication headers.

tasks.title: T04 - Authentication flow design
tasks.description: Design end-to-end authentication flow including token lifecycle, refresh, frontend storage, and backend validation.

tasks.title: T05 - Data ownership model
tasks.description: Define ownership and access rules for books, users, interactions, embeddings, and ML artifacts.

tasks.title: T06 - Initialize React app
tasks.description: Create a React project using Vite and verify dev server, build, and linting setup.

tasks.title: T07 - Frontend folder structure
tasks.description: Organize folders for components, pages, hooks, services, assets, and utils to support long-term maintainability.

tasks.title: T08 - Configure frontend routing
tasks.description: Set up routing for auth pages, book list, book detail, recommendations, chatbot, and search pages.

tasks.title: T09 - Layout components
tasks.description: Build reusable layout components including header, navigation, footer, and responsive wrappers.

tasks.title: T10 - API client abstraction
tasks.description: Implement a centralized API client handling base URLs, headers, auth tokens, and error normalization.

tasks.title: T11 - Initialize FastAPI app
tasks.description: Create FastAPI project, virtual environment, install dependencies, and run a test endpoint.

tasks.title: T12 - Backend project structure
tasks.description: Organize backend into routers, schemas, models, services, config, and utils.

tasks.title: T13 - Environment variable handling
tasks.description: Set up environment variable loading and validation for secrets and configs.

tasks.title: T14 - Connect FastAPI to Supabase
tasks.description: Configure Postgres connectivity and test basic read/write operations.

tasks.title: T15 - Base response schemas
tasks.description: Define consistent API response and error schemas using Pydantic.

tasks.title: T16 - Users table schema
tasks.description: Design users table with fields, constraints, and indexes.

tasks.title: T17 - Books table schema
tasks.description: Design books table optimized for search, recommendations, and metadata enrichment.

tasks.title: T18 - Interactions table schema
tasks.description: Create schema for tracking views, searches, borrows, and clicks.

tasks.title: T19 - Borrow requests table
tasks.description: Design table to store borrow lifecycle events and statuses.

tasks.title: T20 - Add DB indexes
tasks.description: Add indexes for frequent query paths and ML workloads.

tasks.title: T21 - User registration API
tasks.description: Implement signup endpoint with validation and persistence.

tasks.title: T22 - User login API
tasks.description: Implement login endpoint with token issuance.

tasks.title: T23 - Auth middleware
tasks.description: Secure private routes using authentication dependencies.

tasks.title: T24 - Book create API
tasks.description: Allow authenticated users to add books with validation.

tasks.title: T25 - Book list API
tasks.description: Implement paginated and filterable book listing endpoint.

tasks.title: T26 - Book detail UI
tasks.description: Render detailed book view with metadata and actions.

tasks.title: T27 - Book list UI
tasks.description: Render paginated list with loading and empty states.

tasks.title: T28 - Add book form UI
tasks.description: Create controlled form with validation and submission logic.

tasks.title: T29 - Borrow request UI
tasks.description: Trigger borrow requests and show status feedback.

tasks.title: T30 - Frontend auth state
tasks.description: Manage authenticated session state across the app.

tasks.title: T31 - Interaction logging
tasks.description: Log user interactions for analytics and ML usage.

tasks.title: T32 - Data validation checks
tasks.description: Add integrity and consistency checks for stored data.

tasks.title: T33 - Recommendation fundamentals
tasks.description: Study content-based and collaborative filtering approaches.

tasks.title: T34 - Prepare ML dataset
tasks.description: Extract and clean interaction data for model usage.

tasks.title: T35 - Popularity-based recommender
tasks.description: Implement baseline recommender using interaction counts.

tasks.title: T36 - Content similarity model
tasks.description: Compute similarity between books using metadata embeddings.

tasks.title: T37 - Recommendation evaluation
tasks.description: Manually evaluate relevance and coverage of recommendations.

tasks.title: T38 - Learn RAG patterns
tasks.description: Understand retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

tasks.title: T39 - Book text chunking
tasks.description: Chunk and normalize book text for embeddings.

tasks.title: T40 - Generate embeddings
tasks.description: Generate vector embeddings using an embedding model.

tasks.title: T41 - Store embeddings
tasks.description: Persist embeddings in a vector-capable store.

tasks.title: T42 - RAG query pipeline
tasks.description: Retrieve relevant chunks and generate LLM responses.

tasks.title: T43 - Chatbot API
tasks.description: Expose backend endpoint for conversational queries.

tasks.title: T44 - Chatbot UI
tasks.description: Build conversational UI with history and streaming.

tasks.title: T45 - Semantic search concepts
tasks.description: Understand embedding-based semantic search.

tasks.title: T46 - Semantic search API
tasks.description: Implement natural language search using embeddings.

tasks.title: T47 - Search UI integration
tasks.description: Integrate semantic search into frontend.

tasks.title: T48 - Dockerize backend
tasks.description: Create Dockerfile and local container build.

tasks.title: T49 - Dockerize frontend
tasks.description: Create production-ready frontend container.

tasks.title: T50 - CI pipeline setup
tasks.description: Configure CI for linting, tests, and builds.

tasks.title: T51 - Backend deployment
tasks.description: Deploy FastAPI backend to cloud platform.

tasks.title: T52 - Frontend deployment
tasks.description: Deploy React app and verify API connectivity.

tasks.title: T53 - ML inference logging
tasks.description: Log recommendation and chatbot inference events.

tasks.title: T54 - Model versioning
tasks.description: Introduce versioning for embeddings and recommenders.

tasks.title: T55 - Monitor ML latency
tasks.description: Track response times for ML-powered endpoints.

tasks.title: T56 - Fallback strategies
tasks.description: Implement graceful degradation for AI failures.

tasks.title: T57 - Security review
tasks.description: Review auth, data access, and API security risks.

tasks.title: T58 - Performance review
tasks.description: Review system bottlenecks and scaling concerns.

tasks.title: T59 - Observability design
tasks.description: Design logging, metrics, and tracing strategy.

tasks.title: T60 - Architecture documentation
tasks.description: Document final architecture and decisions.

tasks.title: T61 - End-to-end test flow
tasks.description: Execute full user journey testing across system.

tasks.title: T62 - Frontend error boundaries
tasks.description: Implement error boundaries for UI stability.

tasks.title: T63 - Backend rate limiting
tasks.description: Add basic rate limiting to APIs.

tasks.title: T64 - Data cleanup scripts
tasks.description: Write scripts to clean inconsistent data.

tasks.title: T65 - Recommendation API
tasks.description: Expose recommendation results via backend endpoint.

tasks.title: T66 - Recommendation UI
tasks.description: Display personalized recommendations.

tasks.title: T67 - Prompt tuning for RAG
tasks.description: Refine prompts for accurate book answers.

tasks.title: T68 - Embedding refresh job
tasks.description: Design periodic embedding regeneration.

tasks.title: T69 - Load testing backend
tasks.description: Run basic load tests on APIs.

tasks.title: T70 - Scale strategy
tasks.description: Define horizontal and vertical scaling approaches.

tasks.title: T71 - Cache strategy
tasks.description: Design caching for reads and ML outputs.

tasks.title: T72 - API versioning plan
tasks.description: Plan backward-compatible API evolution.

tasks.title: T73 - Secrets management
tasks.description: Secure secrets using environment or secret manager.

tasks.title: T74 - Audit logging
tasks.description: Add audit logs for critical actions.

tasks.title: T75 - Retry logic
tasks.description: Add retries for transient failures.

tasks.title: T76 - Frontend performance tuning
tasks.description: Optimize rendering and bundle size.

tasks.title: T77 - Backend async optimization
tasks.description: Optimize async DB and API calls.

tasks.title: T78 - Recommendation cold start
tasks.description: Handle users with no interaction history.

tasks.title: T79 - Search relevance tuning
tasks.description: Tune semantic search relevance thresholds.

tasks.title: T80 - Chatbot hallucination handling
tasks.description: Add guardrails to reduce hallucinations.

tasks.title: T81 - Feature flags
tasks.description: Introduce feature flags for AI features.

tasks.title: T82 - Observability dashboards
tasks.description: Create dashboards for system health.

tasks.title: T83 - ML output sampling
tasks.description: Sample ML outputs for quality review.

tasks.title: T84 - Data retention policy
tasks.description: Define retention rules for logs and embeddings.

tasks.title: T85 - Backup strategy
tasks.description: Define backup and recovery plan.

tasks.title: T86 - Chaos testing basics
tasks.description: Simulate failure scenarios.

tasks.title: T87 - API documentation
tasks.description: Generate and review OpenAPI docs.

tasks.title: T88 - Frontend accessibility
tasks.description: Ensure basic accessibility compliance.

tasks.title: T89 - ML retraining trigger
tasks.description: Define conditions for retraining models.

tasks.title: T90 - Cost monitoring
tasks.description: Monitor infra and LLM usage costs.

tasks.title: T91 - Security headers
tasks.description: Add security headers for frontend and backend.

tasks.title: T92 - Dependency auditing
tasks.description: Audit dependencies for vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: T93 - Data anonymization
tasks.description: Anonymize sensitive user data for ML usage.

tasks.title: T94 - Recommendation bias review
tasks.description: Analyze and mitigate recommendation bias.

tasks.title: T95 - Search query analytics
tasks.description: Analyze search query patterns.

tasks.title: T96 - Chatbot usage analytics
tasks.description: Analyze chatbot interaction metrics.

tasks.title: T97 - SLA definition
tasks.description: Define latency and uptime SLAs.

tasks.title: T98 - Incident response plan
tasks.description: Define incident response procedures.

tasks.title: T99 - Final architecture review
tasks.description: Perform holistic review of the system.

tasks.title: T100 - Technical handover
tasks.description: Prepare system for handover with docs and runbooks.
